001package gbw.melange.common.mesh.formatting.slicing;
002
003/**
004 * An {@link IFloatSlice} of size 2, but formatted as if a 2-component vector.
005 * Extended by {@link ISliceVec3} and {@link ISliceVec4} which allows for "polymorphic access control"
006 * if say a {@link ISliceVec3} is referenced as a {@link ISliceVec2} - this way removing access to the third component.
007 *
008 * @author GustavBW
009 */
010public interface ISliceVec2 extends IFloatSlice {
011    /**
012     * Get
013     */
014    float x();
015    /**
016     * Get
017     */
018    float y();
019    /**
020     * Set
021     */
022    void x(float value);
023    /**
024     * Set
025     */
026    void y(float value);
027}
